summary: TensorFlow implementation of the Open Pretrained Transformer (OPT) model that encapsulates configuration handling, weight initialization, and utilities for loading and saving pretrained checkpoints, serving as the base class for task‑specific OPT models.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly integrate a state‑of‑the‑art language model into TensorFlow pipelines for tasks such as text generation, summarization, or fine‑tuning on custom datasets.
